definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Excellent alternative to MMS, send files and photos over GPRS.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的替代彩信，通过GPRS发送文件和照片。

sentences.english: Send photos via email or MMS from the Camera app.
sentences.chinese: 通过电子邮件或从相机应用彩信发送照片。

sentences.english: But there's one problems. The default sms and mail application didntwork.
sentences.chinese: 但是，还是有一个问题，默认的彩信和邮件不管用了。

sentences.english: Said that, we have no intention of supporting MMS in Fremantle ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 他说，我们不支持彩信弗里曼特尔自己的意图。

sentences.english: QUEENIE: Everybody feels different about themselves one way or another.
sentences.chinese: 每个人对于自彩信多少钱一条己的感受都不一样。

sentences.english: Other new features include the ability to save videos from the Mail and MMS app.
sentences.chinese: 其它功能包括保存邮件和彩信中的视频。

definition: newsletter/the news in brief/(Tw) SMS message
Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
screensaver/abbr. for 屏幕保護程序|屏幕保护程序[ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4]
